statements: SELECT * FROM content_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM content_assets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_size FROM content_assets WHERE asset_type='image';
SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM content_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC, asset_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_assets ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_size FROM content_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image' ORDER BY asset_size DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_size FROM content_assets WHERE asset_size > 1000 AND asset_type = 'video';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_size FROM content_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('image', 'document') ORDER BY asset_size ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_size, created_at FROM content_assets WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM content_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM content_assets WHERE created_at > NOW();
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, last_modified_at FROM content_assets ORDER BY last_modified_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_tags WHERE tag_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name, created_at FROM content_tags ORDER BY created_at;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM content_assets;
SELECT asset_name, created_at FROM content_assets WHERE asset_type='image';
SELECT * FROM content_assets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_name, last_modified_at FROM content_assets WHERE last_modified_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_modified_at ASC;
SELECT tag_name, tag_description FROM content_tags WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ContentAssets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM ContentAssets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentAssets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_description FROM ContentAssets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AssetTags WHERE tag_name = 'important';
SELECT * FROM ContentAssets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM ContentAssets WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT asset_description FROM ContentAssets WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-06-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM AssetTags ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT ContentAssets.asset_name, AssetTags.tag_name FROM ContentAssets JOIN AssetTags ON ContentAssets.asset_id = AssetTags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM ContentAssets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM ContentAssets WHERE asset_type='Image';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, created_at FROM ContentAssets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM ContentAuthors WHERE author_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT category_name FROM ContentCategories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ContentAssets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM ContentAssets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, created_at FROM ContentAssets WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ContentAuthors JOIN ContentAssets ON ContentAuthors.author_id = ContentAssets.asset_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(asset_id) AS asset_count FROM ContentCategories JOIN ContentAssets ON ContentCategories.category_id = ContentAssets.asset_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY asset_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_assets;
SELECT title, author FROM content_assets WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_name, file_location, file_size FROM asset_files WHERE content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT comment_id, commenter_name, comment_date FROM asset_comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM asset_categories WHERE description LIKE '%software%';
SELECT * FROM content_assets;
SELECT title, author FROM content_assets WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, description FROM asset_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM asset_tags WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT content_id, file_name, file_location FROM asset_files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size DESC;
